author: felicity
msg: bug 3986: add opportunistic_expire_check_only option to init_learn() to specify that the opportunistic function call should only deal with journal sync, and not db expiry -- but mark whether or not expiry is due.  this can then be used by a calling function to do the expiry post-process.
